title: Can you guys do something about this person?
body:
ib4 name removal and no name and shame  every hour this guy isnt banned 12 people get trolled and lose lp for no reason



im not using riot suport for one reason . it takes ages for them to respond and when they do u get autamated response from the philippines or wherever that doesnt do jak

replies.body:
Hey Revelations 13,

I have edited your post, to adhere to the Naming and Shaming rules.

Now I understand your frustration and I will be looking into this account, but please remember we do have systems in place that are designed to take care of this (yes there is no Tribunal, but we do have other tools taking care of things in the mean time).

So please make sure if you feel someone is not correctly representing themselves or causing a bad playing experience, to report them at the end of a game.

-ToxicHawk

>it takes ages

You consider a day to be ages?
